outside of Venezuela for regime change
now before I get started I just want to

let's get into the economic collapse
political and geopolitical news now we
know that Trump on his campaign trail he
kept on talking about NAFTA he kept on
talking about global warming and he made
a lot of promises and like we said we're
looking at both sides here to see if he
is within the deep state and now we are
leaning towards more that the deep state
has him now there are still certain
parts of him where he's trying to do
certain things but it looks like things
are closing in around him and that 1%
hope is dropping in percentages to may
be 0.5% hope because what we're seeing
right now is that on the day the White
House threatened to withdraw from the
North American Free Trade Agreement
that's NAFTA Trump's son-in-law Jared
Kushner well he emerged as the key

Canada now according to White House

Minister Justin Trudeau called Kushner
urgently on April 26 after seeing news
reports that Trump was considering
signing the executive order which was
going to withdraw the United States from

speaks regularly to Canadian officials
on ranges of issues
well Kushner told his Canadian
counterpart that
this was a matter the leaders need to
discuss themselves according to the
White House official and of course the
White House official remains anonymous
now the Canadian media reports something
completely different that Trudeau wasn't
the one who called Kushner Kushner
actually reached out to Trudeau chief of
staff to suggest a call between the two

Kushner has basically saved NAFTA or is
getting involved in the everyday
politics in the White House where Trump
promised to get rid of NAFTA he was
ready to sign the Executive Order and

that Kushner then is working for the
deep state now let's move on to the

deal because global warming is a

pulling the United States out of the

now when we come up to that point where
Trump has to make a decision and he goes
back on his promise if he does do this
he is then in line with the deep State
and he has gone back on his word with

turning his back on everyone that voted

said now he hasn't signed on to the
Paris climate deal
he hasn't removed the United States from
the Paris climate deal he has done
nothing yet
NAFTA he still intend to go in in in

out now we're still waiting to see what

that things are not in his favor as of
right now the only thing that is working

they said absolutely nothing and

there was nothing really
accomplished by this whole entire thing
and what we are seeing right now is that
the bigger question right now is how did

per said he had done the same but that

if the White House has documentation

they lied in front of Congress and

now when Trump came into office many

new leadership is needed to restore

election but marine lepen she is out
there saying that when
well something is wrong with the

now tensions they are definitely rising

three South American countries are

there's going to be the involvement of

remember Michelle

basically the United States controls

out in Syria it looks like the Arab

it doesn't matter what Russia says it

what's very interesting about all this

we are then moving into World War 3 now

basically this is just out there telling

they're still using tricks to convince

to blame this on North Korea and like I

they're going to try to use this type of
